name: ONESHOT (itch) (MantasButkus)
description:
You are the only and great Robin Hood! You live in your camp. You get raided by Roman Empire. You must defend yer land. But behold! 
You have only one arrow!
And you need nothing more, your shoot-then-retrieve-it journey begins!

Trailers: 

Game made for the global game jam 2021 by:
